body.name: VicTsing 2.4G Wireless Mouse for PC, Computer

features: Wireless Connectivity: The mouse operates on a 2.4GHz wireless connection for convenient use.
Compatible Devices: Works with personal computers for smooth navigation and control.
Ambidextrous Design: The mouse has a solid, modern style with no buttons on the bottom.
Long Battery Life: The mouse has an average battery life of 12 months.
High-Precision Tracking: The mouse uses advanced laser technology for precise movement and control.
body.description: 2.4 G Wireless Transmission TechnologyEnjoy the fast data transmission at the convenience of the wireless technology.VicTsing wireless mouse gives you fast data transmission and no delay or dropouts. You deserve it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had this exact mouse for about 4-5 years or more until the clicker stopped working. It's okay it's a long time for a mouse to be going as much as I play video games. Wanted another of the exact type and I wasn't disappointed. :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mouse
reviews.reviewText: I use these for my laptop and have one in multiple locations. They all work with the same USB connector - so one USB connector works with multiple mice. They are low cost, ergonomic, and great for my use case. Please continue to make these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable to hold, good for small hands. Scroll Wheel breaks in year to half year but has warranty
reviews.reviewText: This product is incredibly comfortable, to the point I have gotten the same mouse from the same company multiple times since June 2018 (bought about 5-6 of them). I have small hands which makes most mice incredibly uncomfortable; I use the computer constantly, and this is one of the only mice that doesn't quickly give me hand cramps. I appreciate it enough where I've chosen to bring this with me to use when I have to use other people's computers to avoid the hand cramps I get with other ones. It works plug-n-play and has a hole at the bottom for the USB connector so I haven't had using it on other computers (Windows). I'm also a fan of the side buttons, it's used quite often to move back or forward a page.Now, Battery Life. I feel like it can go through batteries kinda quick. Perhaps couple weeks or once a month? I personally don't mind as I have rechargeable batteries so it isn't a downside, and I'm not sure the battery life on other mice to compare.The worst part is something you'll see in other reviews: the scroll wheel starts acting up and moving up/down. This is honestly quite annoying, and is why part of why I put it to 4 stars. I will say however they do have a rather generous warranty for such a cheap product as it lasts a whole year.For a ~$8 mouse I would very much recommend it, especially if you find most mouses too big but the laptop/'portable' mouses too small. I have tried a few different mouses in the past, including ergonomic, but I just couldn't help but return to this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size and feel
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect. Only had a few months so I can’t speak on longevity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Completely unreliable, doesn't work properly - quality has gone into the toilet
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these 4 years ago, based on reviews. And THAT one is great - it's my standard travel mouse! So when I got tired of dealing with the wire on my desk, I decided I needed to get another one...It looks identical... but it's crap. Jerky movement, times out in under 5 minutes... this is crap. And since there's only a 30 day return period, I wasted my money on this junk.Avoid it. Buy something else. NOT this. I need to go dig up my corded mouse; I can't work with this piece of junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best mouse I ever had. With 0 latency and is the best for gaming. I play CS and this is the best one i ever had. Has the best value for money and could easily compete with those 50-100$ gaming mouse. Would recommend 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it! Why not?
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased three of these; two for home and one for the office. They are good quality. The battery life is decent in the sense that you don't have to worry about it going bad after a few months. The same AA battery lasted me 1-2 years, and it had to be replaced because I accidentally spilled hot chocolate on my mouse (the first one I purchased) - long story. Anywho, get the mouse; it's good. Plus, my hand does not cramp up after using it for an extended period. So, if you have a laptop and your hands get cramps after using the touchpad for extended periods, you might like this, and it would give your hand a break.

reviews.reviewText: Just plug into the USB port.
